thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1788
thread.title: KAROLINA

author: KAROLINA
title: KAROLINA
text: Very user friendly site. I love the notifications when price drops and saving a seat for me at the price I've seen few hours ago (even thought it slightly increased). Allows multiple airlines combination which helps to reduce flight cost (one way ticket at the airline site was way more expensive!). Ticket confirmed within minutes and booking also appeared on airline site, so all went perfect. Saved a lot of money.
